title: BOCOMAL FR Pants for Men Flame Resistant Duck and Denim Carpenter Pants Fire Retardant Jeans
description: FR MATRIALS：11.5OZ Cotton Pre-washed Denium,FR Treated,FR Buttons,FR Sewing Threads,FR Zipper!Clear FR Tag on pocket.More FR info On Tag About UL Certification.We Attached A Small Sample Inside Package For Cunstomers Simple FR Try

FASION AND COMFIT:This FR Work Jeans Double Front Provides A Perfect Durable Use And Comfortable Relaxed Fit Also Soft And fashionable.We Did Prewash/ Preshrunk And Wrinkle-Free.No shrink after wash! These work pants designed as a carpenter and utility storage,totally have 8 pockets all , 5 Classic jeans pockets(2 back pockets,2 front pockets,1 watch pocket),2 slash pockets on right and 1 pockets on left , 1 hammer loop on left!

ENSURE SAFETY AT WORK :Our Jeans Protect You Everyday! This garments meets or exceeds the standards for HRC2,Arc Rating Atpv 14 Calories/cm2 and the requirements of NFPA2112 Standard on Flame Resisant Garments for Protection of industrial Personal Against Flash Fire,2012 Edition.Also NFPA70E ASTM F1506 AND CAT II Certified!

MULTI-USE:Made For Welders, Fitters, Ironworkers, Electricians, And Other Industrial Workers Even At Home. It Can Be Used For Any Kind Of Industrial And Construction works.More Durable Fabrics Pockets In Just The Right Places With So Many Features That Help You Get The Job Done. Our Work Jeans Pretect You Everyday And Help You Doing Heavy Works.

MORE USE TIME: UP TO 100 WASHES ,Our Jeans has the appropriate level of protective gear and stays enforced up to numerous washes. You can wear and wash it over and over again for up to 100 times before FR still works.(NFPA2112,ASTM F1506,CAT II)
